title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 105.5 - Commission review and approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 105.5 - Commission review and approval

State Regulations

Upon receipt and review of emergency plans or amendments
filed by an electric corporation under this Part, the commission may require
any such corporation to modify such plans or amendments or otherwise prescribe
conditions for approval. Approval will be based on compliance with the
requirements of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
105.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
